scripts.ci.base.setup: npm i -g typescript@3.9.7 && echo no | npm i -g nativescript && tns usage-reporting disable && tns error-reporting disable && cd src && npm run build
scripts.ci.pip.install: sudo pip install --upgrade pip && sudo pip install six
scripts.ci.tslint: cd src && npm run ci.tslint && cd ../demo && npm run ci.tslint
scripts.demo.ios: cd src && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run ios --no-hmr
scripts.demo.android: cd src && npm run build && cd ../demo && tns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo.ng.ios: cd src && npm run build.ng.module && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --no-hmr --env.aot
scripts.demo.ng.android: cd src && npm run build.ng.module && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --no-hmr --env.aot
